name: (2022AU-2541-T1) Spirit Ascension
description:
RESET IS USED BY REFRESHING OR CLOSING WINDOW

(Game Summary)
This game takes place in a graveyard while the player plays as a skateboarding ghost dodging obstacles and dangerous foe along the way. The player is conflicted with jack-o-lantern mobs placed through the  level while trying to maintain completing the course. Fighting back is an option giving the player the ability to shoot whatever is in front or coming at them.

(Game Outline)

  • Starts in a graveyard as the player goes on jack-o-lanterns fly by trying to hit the player
  • Player can shoot the obstacles or dodge them depending on situation
  • Player can also pick up coins to increase speed, completing the level faster
  • Coin power ups only last for a short duration of time
  • Jumping gaps and platforms as they dodge and shoot
  • End of level is when the player reaches the scarecrow without losing the total of three lives (Player can close the browser or refresh to play again)

(Game Controls)
Movement Keys - A, D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow
Jump Key - Space
Shoot Key - F

(Team Members)
Joel, Winfield, Max 

(Credits for sound)

  • jump - https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/skateboard/page/4/ - "Skateboard set down upside down on deck 3"
  • pumpkin death - https://www.zapsplat.com/page/2/?s=pumpkin&post_type=music&sound-effect-category... - "Pumpkin seeds (Pepita) in packet, set down on table 1"
  • projectile - https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=baseball&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-id - "Baseball ball hit with wooden bat"
  • coin collection - https://www.zapsplat.com/page/2/?s=power+up&post_type=music&sound-effect-categor... - "Retro 8-bit video game power up 2"
  • collision - https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=splat&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-id - "8bit splat, bomb boom, blast, cannon, classic cartoon"
